item.title: Hello World
item.content:encoded:
Hello

World

item.title: The Emperor's New Mind
item.content:encoded:
The Emperor's New Mind by Roger Penrose

A rigorous, mind-bending arduous journey encompassing a path through Turing machines, algorithms & computability, black holes, Hilbert spaces, Mandelbrot sets, quantum mechanics, brains, consciousness reducing down to an attempt at understanding and speculating the non-algorithmic nature of the mind. Remarkably raises more questions than answered that one feels compelled to ponder about.

item.title: Ready, study, Go!
item.content:encoded:
Ready, study, Go! by Kurshed Batliwala & Dinesh Ghodke

A holistic path towards learning. The process of learning deconstructed and explained from the POV of a layman.

item.title: Homo Deus - A Brief History of Tomorrow
item.content:encoded:
Homo Deus - A Brief History of Tomorrow by Yuval Noah Harari

What after homo sapiens? Visualising and contemplating the progression of humanity through a conglomeration of social, political, cultural and scientific lenses.

item.title: A Brief History of Time
item.content:encoded:
A Brief History of Time by Stephen Hawking

Classic primer of astrophysics. Relativity.

item.title: How to Solve It
item.content:encoded:
How to Solve It by G. Pólya

How to do math! The intricacies behind the abstractions.

item.title: Chaos
item.content:encoded:
Chaos by James Gleick

An elucidation of the mathematics behind causality of tornadoes seeded by the flap of a butterfly's wings. Also, fractals and the Mandelbrot set!

item.title: The Selfish Gene
item.content:encoded:
The selfish gene by Richard Dawkins

Who is in control? We believe we are in control of our lives...We can't possibly be further away from the truth.

item.title: Art of thinking clearly
item.content:encoded:
Art of thinking clearly by Rolf Dobelli

Millennia of evolution and conditioning has defined the way we think. Learn how to deconstruct it to elicit lucidity.

item.title: Think like Da Vinci
item.content:encoded:
Think like Da Vinci by Michael J. Gelb

First principles. Curiosità, Dimostrazione, Sensazione, Sfumato, Arte/Scienza, Corporalita, Connessione.

item.title: The Tao of physics
item.content:encoded:
The Tao of physics by Fritjof Capra

Modern physics meets eastern mysticism. Zen powered Quantum mechanics!

item.title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
item.content:encoded:
The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck by Mark Manson

Life bestows a finite number of fucks to be given everyday. Choose wisely where/to whom you give them (if you let something bother you, you gave a fuck)

item.title: Sapiens - A Brief History of Humankind
item.content:encoded:
Sapiens - A Brief History of Humankind by Yuval Noah Harari

Who are we, where do we come from? Where are we headed as a species?
